alert.note: Alert for Brooks (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued November 30 at 10:26AM EST until November 30 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 577 REMAINS VALID UNTIL NOON EST TODAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN JEFFERSON LEON LIBERTY WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA GULF IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BROOKS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALMA, APALACHICOLA, BAY CITY, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLUE SPRINGS, BRADFORDVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCK SIDING, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, DALKEITH, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, EMPRESS, FESTUS, FORT GADSDEN, GROOVERVILLE, HILLIARDVILLE, HONEYVILLE, HOWARD CREEK, JARROTT, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MONTICELLO, NANKIN, OAK GROVE, ODENA, PORT ST. JOE, QUITMAN, SOPCHOPPY, ST. MARKS, SWEETWATER, TALLAHASSEE, TILTON, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WEWAHITCHKA, AND WHITE CITY.
